revised_title: Inositol Lipids and Transmembrane Signaling: G-proteins, Inositol Lipid Signaling Pathway, and Secretion
tldr: The article discusses the role of G-proteins in the inositol lipid signaling pathway, which generates inositol trisphosphate (InsP3) and diacylglycerol as second messengers. The author identifies two types of G-proteins, Gp and GE, that are involved in this signaling system and their connection to cellular secretion processes.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
